meanings.definition: The act of caring for a child or children in the absence of their parents.
meanings.sent1: Babysitting can be a fun way to spend time with kids.
meanings.sent2: I have to do some babysitting for my neighbor's children tonight.
meanings.sent3: The babysitting adventure began with a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her love for babysitting was like a warm hug for the children.
meanings.sent5: The babysitting experience left a lasting impression on the young ones.

meanings.definition: The job or activity of looking after children for a short period of time.
meanings.sent1: During the party, the teenagers took turns babysitting the younger kids.
meanings.sent2: She earns extra money by babysitting on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The babysitting gig turned into a mini dance party.
meanings.sent4: His approach to babysitting was as organized as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The art of babysitting requires patience and creativity.
